thread.title: Kim Kardashian's baby due on Christmas?
thread.title_full: Kim Kardashian's baby due on Christmas? - Entertainment

author: IANS
title: Kim Kardashian's baby due on Christmas?
text:
Los Angeles: Reality TV personality Kim Kardashian is reportedly expected to give birth to her second baby on December 25.


Kim Kardashian. Pic/Santa Banta  
Sources close Kim and her husband Kanye West have told tmz.com that doctors have back-timed the date of conception and the couple has been told their son will be born on Christmas.
According to reports, there are some reasons why the doctors are convinced about Kim's date of conception.
Kim suffers from placenta accreta, a serious pregnancy condition where the placenta grows too deeply into the uterine wall, which could be dangerous. Hence, the doctors plan on a natural birth on Christmas Day.
However, a C-section is deemed necessary on that day if she doesn't give birth beforehand. It will be done for safety reasons.
The couple have already booked a Deluxe Maternity Suite at Cedars-Sinai in Los Angeles.
